channel.title: Posts on Adventure Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Adventure Explorer

item.title: Battlefield Vegas Shooting Range
item.description: The whole establishment is decked out. Lots of vehicles outside and tons of guns inside to look at with LOTS of DO NOT TOUCH signs :( But I want one! Black Ops Gamer Experience Based on a popular first-person-shooter video game, the Black Ops package puts you in real life action as the first person shooter. Trade in your video game controller and headset for an AK-47, Uzi, MP5, and a Colt Commando.

item.title: Lake Havasu Boating
item.description: Water is great. Lots of water and toys even better! Yeah, I busted my lip on this the cliff diving, so careful out there!

item.title: Napa Valley Wine Train
item.description:
I don’t always drink wine, but when I do it’s on a wine train in Napa Valley! Yes, you can lean out of the windows for footage. Hopefully you enjoy looking at grapes, because the scale of grapes growing is vast and impressive.
I actually don’t recall taking this video. Perhaps it was after my train tour and I was a little tipsy. Like they say, “when in Rome!” That might also explain why I’m standing on the track unable to see whether a train is coming in the opposite direction about to take me out.

item.title: San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park
item.description: https://www.nps.gov/safr/learn/historyculture/hercules.htm https://www.nps.gov/safr/learn/historyculture/balclutha.htm https://www.nps.gov/safr/learn/historyculture/eppleton-hall.htm

item.title: San Francisco Maritime USS Pampanito
item.description: https://maritime.org/uss-pampanito/

item.title: Slotzilla Zoomline
item.description: With all of the heigh stuff I have done in the past, along with going to the Stratosphere after this I thought it might not be fun, but it was a blast. Just a short blast, but something to do in the Fremont area of Vegas. Zoomline 11 Stories Up Fly Super Hero Style 5 Blocks Long https://vegasexperience.com/fremont-zipline-slotzilla/

item.title: Stratosphere Thrill Rides
item.description: How much fun are these when you don’t even like heights! https://www.stratospherehotel.com/ThrillRides

item.title: Zion National Park Angels Landing Hike
item.description: Photo Album

item.title: Helicopter Ride Over Seattle
item.description: After 9 years of living in Seattle I thought I had seen the whole city. I was wrong. This company took off from Boeing field and I assume most of them do, since it is so close to Seattle.

item.title: SKYJUMP LAS VEGAS – 855 FEET!
item.description: For being way higher than the bungee jumps that I’ve done, this really wasn’t bad at all. It’s a nice almost “gentle” fall to the ground below.

item.title: SNOWBOARDING AT SUMMIT WITH NEW SAMSUNG 360 CAMERA
item.description: Playing in the clouds on a mountain covered with snow. This is heading down the lower part of Alpine at Summit Central. If there is one positive of all the rain in the northwest this is it.

item.title: Zion National Park The Narrows Hike
Bungee Las Vegas Spring Break 2000
item.description: It’s a shame that this place no longer exists. I believe the tower is still there, but hasn’t been operational for a long time.

item.title: You can have a featured post here!
item.description: Contact me for information and ideas for featured posts. Can include: - menu bar - front page post - rotating banner - side bar ad

item.title: Flyboard and Jetovator in Lake Sammamish
item.description: I did the flyboard and jetovator in Lake Sammamish. Way more difficult, than it looks.

item.title: Helicopter Flight in a Hughes 500 over Kauai NO DOORS!
item.description: No doors is the way to go! Just way more fun and no reflections on camera shots too. https://www.helicopters-kauai.com/

item.title: SCUBA DIVING KONA HAWAII GARDEN EEL COVE 2003
item.description: Went with Jack’s Diving Locker and it was a blast!

item.title: SCUBA DIVING KONA HAWAII MANTA RAY NIGHT DIVE 2003
item.description: Only one Manta Ray showed up, but that is better than none!

item.title: SEATTLE SEGWAY
item.description: These were way easier and way more fun to ride than I had expected. Of course it rained on us towards the end.

item.title: WASHINGTON BRIDGE BUNGEE JUMP OVER 200 FEET
item.description: With GoPros around now this video footage would be a lot better.

item.title: Wakeboarding on the Willamette
item.description: Clouds couldn’t stop a good time. The video is mostly west of the Newburg dock. Wakeboarding behind a ski boat with no ballast tanks; I’ll still take it! Any way to get out on the water is a good one. We used to put hundreds of pounds of sand bags in the back for a little more wake :) I’d definitely use fatsacs nowadays even if it meant being a little cramped.
